scan_script_only_check.description: UserCookie v3 is generated only when system property "glide.ui.secure.cookies.use_kmf" is disabled. UserCookie v3 is not secure due to storing secret key for HMAC in source code and identical for all customers. That can support malicious actors to use this one secret key for attempts to hijacking user sessions.
scan_script_only_check.name: Cookie Version 3.1 is not enabled
scan_script_only_check.resolution_details: Ensure the property "glide.ui.secure.cookies.use_kmf" is set to "true".
